actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans. Hearings held. Hearings printed:  S.Hrg. 98-626.
Committee on Veterans. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1388 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for a 5-year extension to permit States to apply for Federal aid in establishing, expanding or improving State veterans' cemeteries.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for FY 1985-1989 to provide a five-year extension to permit States to apply for Federal aid in establishing or improving State veterans' cemeteries.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for a 5-year extension to permit States to apply for Federal aid in establishing, expanding or improving State veterans' cemeteries.
